attributes.action: Scrap or sort out the flaws in the Proposed ProDub Licence, to make the whole thing fair and workable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MCPRS have proposed the new Produb licence, which in its current state is not workable and very unfair to certain professions.  We recommend that the government should change it so there are no flaws and it is a fair workable licence, we dont mind the licence, we just dont want to be conned.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
